title: AirAsia India
summary: AirAsia India is an airline in India headquartered in Bengaluru, Karnataka. The airline is a joint venture with Tata Sons holding 83.67% stake in the airline and AirAsia Investment Limited (Malaysia) holding 16.33% stake.[4][5] AirAsia India commenced operations on 12 June 2014 with Bengaluru as its primary hub.
